title: Highest Account Ownership Among Older Adults
description: In 2021, 100% of the population aged 25 and older in the Netherlands owned an account at a financial institution or with a mobile-money-service provider, the highest rate in the world.

title: Lowest PM2.5 Pollution Exposure
description: In 2017, only 0.04% of the population in the Netherlands was exposed to PM2.5 pollution levels exceeding the WHO Interim Target-3 value, the lowest exposure rate globally.

title: Largest Net Outflow of Foreign Direct Investment
description: In 2023, the Netherlands experienced a net outflow of foreign direct investment amounting to -$332.5 billion, the largest outflow recorded worldwide.
